Oatmeal Cookies

cookies
dessert

Ingredients

  • 2 cups flour
  • 1 1/2 cup packed brown sugar
  • 1/2 cup white sugar
  • 1 tsp baking powder
  • 1 tsp baking soda
  • 1/2 tsp cinnamon
  • 1 tsp clove
  • 1 tsp nutmeg
  • 1 cup shortening
  • 1 tsp vanilla
  • 2 eggs
  • 1 1/2 cup oats

Procedure

  1. Preheat oven to 375
  2. In a medium bowl, mix together flour, sugar, baking powder and soda, cinnamon, cloves, and nutmeg
  3. Cut the shortening into the dry ingredients
  4. Add the vanilla and then the eggs, one at a time and mix until completely incorporated
  5. Stir in oats
  6. Form into balls and roll in sugar.
  7. Flatten with a spoon.
  8. Bake at 375 for 10-12 minutes.
